snippet: The day before suspected members of the Islamist group Boko Haram shot dead eight people at a bar. The group’s increasingly violent insurgency has become a major security problem for President Goodluck Jonathan’s administration.
abstract: Gunmen fatally shoot four people in same town in Nigeria where, a day before, suspected members of the Islamist group Boko Haram shot dead eight people; increasingly violent insurgency has become a major security problem for Pres Goodluck Jonathan's administration.
lead_paragraph: The day before suspected members of the Islamist group Boko Haram shot dead eight people at a bar. The group’s increasingly violent insurgency has become a major security problem for President Goodluck Jonathan’s administration.
